abstract: Workers walked off the job Sunday at the only oil refinery in Scotland, requiring BP to close a pipeline that supplies about a third of Britain’s petroleum needs.
snippet: Workers walked off the job Sunday at the only oil refinery in Scotland, requiring BP to close a pipeline that supplies about a third of Britain’s petroleum needs.
lead_paragraph: PARIS  Workers walked off the job Sunday at the only oil refinery in Scotland, requiring BP to close a pipeline that supplies about a third of Britain’s petroleum needs.

headline.main: Strike at Scotland Refinery Forces BP to Shut a Pipeline
headline.print_headline: Strike at Scotland Refinery Forces BP to Shut a Pipeline
